class Card[source]

Card(suit=0, rank=2)

Represents a standard playing card.

Attributes: suit: integer 0-3 rank: integer 1-13

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Deck[source]

Deck()

Represents a deck of cards. Attributes: cards: list of Card objects.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Hand[source]

Hand(label='') :: Deck

Represents a hand of playing cards.
